Uses of Widget in com.fluidops.iwb.widget
 

Classes in com.fluidops.iwb.widget that implement Widget
 class AbstractChartWidget<T extends WidgetChartConfig>
          Base class for widgets that display charts.
 class AbstractWidget<T>
          Base implementation class of IWB widgets.
 class AccessForbiddenWidget
          image widget (version for new widget mapping framework)
 class ActionableResultWidget
          ActionableResultWidget is a TableResultWidget with code execution support, uses CodeExecutionWidget functionality for executing code (which can reference bindings from the table row as additional input).
 class BarChartWidget
          Show the results of a query in form of a bar chart.
 class ChartWidget
          Show the results of a query associated with an object.
 class CodeExecutionWidget
          Code execution widget for java and groovy code. 1) leveraged nested parameter parsing 2) supports the new groovy classloading 3) uses regular java / groovy reflection (i.e. any method can be called) For a specification and complete usage scenario (e.g. how types can be used), see CodeExecutionWidgetTest.
 class ComponentWidget
          allows rendering FComponents in the wiki.
 class ConfigDocumentation
          Document the parameters of a given Config class
 class ConfigEditWidget
          Configuration edit widget that used ConfigDoc annotations of Config.
 class ContextEditTableWidget
          This widget displays a table, which contains information about all available contexts.
 class DataEntryTableWidget
          TODO: This widget could be discontinued, since the DataInputWidget provides the same functionalities.
 class DataInputWidget
          Each customizable new instance widget is composed as follows: Wizard Page 1: ID generation (1a) There is a idInput struct to configure id a list of.
 class DataTypePropEntryTableWidget
          widget that can be used on the page of Object and DataType Properties.
 class DBLPPublicationWidget
          Download button to a (local or global) HTML location
 class DisplayConfigurationWidget
          Widget to display the (ParameterConfigDoc) configuration annotations OR the (TypeConfiDoc) class description annotation from a given class "clazz".
 class DownloadWidget
          Download button to a (local or global) HTML location
 class EditorialWidget
          displays all changed statements in tabular form
 class ExportRDFWidget
           
 class FacebookWidget
          Shows the facebook like-box for a valid facebook fan page id or depending on the facebook account given as 'http://facebook.com/..' connect, join or attend badges are displayed
 class FileUploadWidget
          This widget enables the upload of a file to the file system.
 class GMapWidget
          GMap widget
 class GraphWidget
           
 class HeatMapWidget
          Show the results of a query in form of a heat map.
 class IFrameWidget
          This widget adds an iframe to a wiki page showing the content from the specified source URL.
 class ImageWidget
          image widget (version for new widget mapping framework)
 class ImportRDFWidget
           
 class LastFMWidget
          Widget to access last.fm data using their API Internally LastFMCache is used, which maintains already retrieved information in a main memory cache.
 class LikeWidget
          Shows the facebook like-button for a link.
 class LineChartWidget
          Show the results of a query in form of a line chart.
 class LinkedInWidget

 class NamespaceConfigurationWidget

 class NewsWidget

 class PathQueryWidget

 class PivotWidget

 class QueryResultWidget

 class RadarChartWidget
          Show the results of a query in form of a radar chart.
 class SearchResultWidget
          This widget displays the result set of a search query as a table.

 class SemWikiWidget
          Encapsulation of the SemWiki widget.
 class SimpleNewInstanceWidget
           
 class SkypeWidget
          This widget adds a Skype button to a wiki page showing the status of the contact you specified.
 class SPARQLInterfaceWidget
          This widget encapsules a SPARQL Interface for the Information Workbench in a widget.
 class StockChartWidget
          Show the results of a query in form of a stock chart.
 class TableResultWidget
          Show the results of a query in a table.
 class TagCloudWidget
          This widget creates a Tag Cloud.
 class TimelineWidget
          timeline widget (using simile-timeline widget from http://www.simile-widgets.org) shows the events (results of the given query) on a timeline, given temporal information of each event.
 class TimeplotWidget
          The widget plots numeric values on a timeline.
 class TreeResultWidget
          This widget creates a tree, which nodes are connected by predicates chosen by the user.
 class TripleEditorWidget
          Widget for clustered viewing and/or editing of some or all triples related to one resource.
 class TwitterWidget
          This widget displays a twitter feed provided a valid twitter id or a topic.
 class UserManagementAdministrationWidget
           
 class UserRegistrationWidget
           
 class VoIDWidget
          This widget enables the user to calculate VoID statistics for a context by clicking on a single button.
 class YouTubeWidget
          Shows the YouTube player for a given YouTube video ID or finds items according to a specified search string.
